title: When can we expect Ekko.
body: I know generally it's about a week or two after the patch has been done and the champion has been revealed but I feel as if they're moving this one along quickly. The patch is tonight, right? (I'm not sure if it is I'm assuming). I mean, I wouldn't say he'd be released tonight as he only just hit the PBE a day or two ago. So I guess we're looking at another week at least. What does everybody else think?

replies.body: The patch after the champion spotlight.

did the patch notes say anything about him being released? no I don't think they did.
he'll probs be released in either 5.10 or 5.11

He won't be released before 5.10 (next patch/the patch currently on PBE - the patch that shipped this week was 5.9) since that contains all of his assets.  So assuming things go smooth with him on PBE (not always guaranteed), he'll most likely be turned on during 5.10 sometime.

> [{quoted}](name=Zedophile,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7FqOk5EA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-14T09:30:22.486+0000)
>
>  I feel as if they're moving this one along quickly. The patch is tonight, right?


what makes you feel this way ?
do remember that they had a tournament right before his champ teaser, so that may have influenced the tease to reveal time/speed


just remember Lucian took 73 days from reveal to release ! which goes to show , even if they intend to release him soon if he dosnt test well on the pbe he could be there for a while fine tuning.

When he's ready.

Smart talk aside, champions have been varying a lot in their release times due to ironing/fixing/tweakings. I'd say no less than a week or two, but might even be three months. Who knows. He'll be ready when he's ready, litterally.
